title: Rememento - White Shadow
description: Rememento - White Shadow is a turn-based RPG game. Make your own team and build tactics. Explore the vast world and make your own path of destiny.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The one who has god’s memory, fight for white dawn.
<!--text-->
Easy start, deep play!
Strategical RPG, Rememento - White Shadow

# A compelling story with a vast depth
Beneath the remnants of the memories of the primordial gods, there are those who seek life amidst the eternal nightmares of the witches.
You have been chosen from among the countless, and you hold the final key to break the chains of this timeless fate.

Become the last hope and save the world from the initial chaos and darkness.

The great adventure of saving the world from eternal darkness begins.

“In this night of mixed light and darkness,
whether the white night will come, or the dark eye will take over. 
Everything lies in the trajectory of fate.”

# Characters illustration with deep attraction
“Build your own party with characters of different professions and attributes.”
Detailed and well-drawn characters by top-notch illustrators elevate your story and battle experience.
Jump into the fun with high-quality characters full of personality.

# A combat system with deep strategy
A simple combat system that lets you jump right into battle in the open world. Enjoy the game quickly and easily without complications.
Unified resources to use and upgrade skills, allowing you to create powerful strategies with simple controls.

# Various things to do with different depths of fun
In addition to the main story, the game is packed with a variety of content, including regular dungeons, high-level dungeons, field exploration, guild activities, PVP, and more.
There's also collectible content, including a likability system and collection books, so there's always something new to do in the game.

# Art quality with different depths of detail
With custom shaders and mobile-optimized modeling, you can enjoy immersive story and combat on any device.
User-friendly interface screens make it easy to enjoy the game.

Play now!
A mysterious and dark journey awaits you that is hard to experience on mobile.

We invite you to enter the unique world of Rememento.
